description:
Ren is, in outward appearances, an extremely nice and polite star. However, he shows his true self whenever he deals with Kyouko. He was originally unhappy with Kyouko, because she joined show business for revenge. However, he gradually warms up towards her. Realising that she isn`t just trying to become an actress for revenge, and supports her growth as a budding idol.
[Spoiler]His real name is Kuon Hizuri but Kyouko call him "Corn" by mistake at the time he first met Kyouko at Kyoto. He only realized it when Kyouko dropped her treasure (A small rock Corn found on the river)[/spoiler]
name: Tsuruga Ren
